snippet.title: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Warhammer 40,000: Gladius – Relics of War brings you to a world of terror and violence. Four factions will engage in a brutal war for dominance over the planet’s resources.

http://www.slitherine.com/gladius

Coming soon in 2018!

Wishlist it now on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/489630/Warhammer_40000_Gladius__Relics_of_War/

The trailer was commissioned to and developed and produced by Michèl Niedermeier aka XShadowY https://www.youtube.com/user/XShadowY/ || http://www.micnie.com/ in collaboration with Slitherine
